abstract: Biogen Idec shares moved higher Friday on news that the Federal Trade Commission has approved activist investor Carl C. Icahn to purchase more of the company’s shares, MarketWatch reported. Stock in the biotech company rose 5 percent to $62.89, a 52-week high.
lead_paragraph: Biogen Idec shares moved higher Friday on news that the Federal Trade Commission has approved activist investor Carl C. Icahn to purchase more of the company’s shares, MarketWatch reported. Stock in the biotech company rose 5 percent to $62.89, a 52-week high.

headline.main: Icahn Is Cleared for Biogen Move
